attributes.action: Statutory entitlement for medical appointments during full-time working hours
attributes.additional_details: Whether this would be paid or unpaid is at the discretion of the employer. This could include having a set number of hours where the employee is paid and if the appointment or procedure is likely to take a day or longer including recovery, would be unpaid until qualifying for Statutory Sick Pay.
attributes.background: I would like to propose a statutory entitlement to attend medical appointments during work hours where an employee is on a full-time contract. This would seek to abolish penalties such as the deduction of days from an employee's statutory leave entitlement, providing evidence can be provided.
